lenders.occupational_info: Right now I help people find housing and work as an administrator in a small minority owned real estate company.

I am here to honor my Gift, and to pay it forward. 

Feeling and expressing compassion is just not enough. I believe in helping people help themselves. We all need a little help now and then and for very few dollars I can help make a big difference in someone life. It's time to close the door of hate and open the door of love all over the world.

I'm grateful and very lucky and want to share what I can with others who haven't had as many opportunities in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in the laboratory of a large teaching hospital. We identify the bacteria (and fungi and viruses) that are making people sick and then determine which antibiotics can be used to make them well.
I'm also working on a Master's in Global Public Health and hope to work towards strengthening medical laboratories in developing countries.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I support a fair Global economy
lenders.occupational_info: I work in telecommunications.

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because: Giving people the tools to better their lives is the kindest and most respectful way to help someone. It enriches their soul as well as their material needs
lenders.occupational_info: Data processing/ Skin Care Products

lenders.name: Eden
lenders.loan_because: people should have the opportunity to live out of their gifts.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: This was a gift to me. I feel this is a great idea to give opportunities to people who have the heart but not the money to start or help their business grow
lenders.occupational_info: I Love what I do

lenders.name: Khan
lenders.loan_because: I know how lucky I am when compared to most people on this planet.  No-one's going to even the scales if I, and people like me, don't.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make a game that lets people of all ages play with each other, no matter how far away they are, through their computers.

lenders.name: thistle
lenders.loan_because: life is short!  We should try to help each other through it as best we can, and make the journey as sweet as possible...
lenders.occupational_info: I build and run programs that help connect university graduate students with the communities around them, so that we can all learn from each other.  I try to make sure that my research work also is relevant to the communities around us.

lenders.name: Sim
lenders.loan_because: I have had a good life and want to share it with others.  This world can be a beautiful place if we try to help and respect one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in the food industry most of my life ... serving coffee, baking breads, and waiting on tables.  I love to travel and see the world.

lenders.name: AussieDingo1983
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept behind Kiva, which is helping people to help themselves, empowering them to lift themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a shop which I use to sell goods via the internet.

lenders.name: Derek & Christine
lenders.loan_because: We feel it is very important to give back.  Helping others is a wonderful thing.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a sign and graphics company.

lenders.name: Marilee
lenders.loan_because: i want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: i rent and sell retro and high performance surf boards.

lenders.name: Jules
lenders.loan_because: I have two grandsons.  I make loans every month in their names & in mine.  Some day, they can see how the few dollars I've spent each month have rebounded through the years, making a difference in hundreds of lives.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: there are too many people throughout the world that need help to survive and prosper. I started loaning because my daughter believes this to be a worthwhile program. She's obviously correct... again.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a food business where we sell a food item that is taken home and baked.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: I'm so inspired by all of these entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I have been a part of Kiva and believe that these connections are one step on the path to a better future.
lenders.occupational_info: Dreaming big and small.

lenders.name: M & K
lenders.loan_because: If we can help someone to improve her or his life by giving this kind of a small loan, absolutely!

lenders.name: Kira
lenders.loan_because: I support women
lenders.occupational_info: Graduate program in Somatic Psychotherapy (body-mind therapy) at California Institute of Integral Studies

lenders.name: Ayers Family
lenders.loan_because: Jesus commanded, "Love your neighbor." When asked to define "neighbor," Jesus expanded the traditional meaning of the word -- defining our neighbor as anyone who is in need

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to change someone's life for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work so I can see the world.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I have 25 dollars in my bank account. I don't pretend to have any advantage over entrepreneurs in other parts of the world; in fact, they are undoubtedly more knowledgeable and world-wise than I.  I hope that by lending to people in need, I might learn more about my world and about the power of love.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are willing to help themselves. It's one thing to give someone something in the spirit of charity, but it's an entirely different thing to help them become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my clients figure out challenging problems and the best way to go about solving those problems. My clients are generally concerned with how to run their businesses more effectively or efficiently.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people to live happy lives and Kiva micro loans seem like an effective way to serve people who are motivated and able to benefit from the help.

lenders.name: David & Gitte
lenders.loan_because: We believe in entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: immigration law

lenders.name: Riley
lenders.loan_because: I care!
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: paula
lenders.loan_because:
i can...and we should....im 'poor' by north american standards...but i can still afford to help...
this is my thanks to God for the blessings in my life...

lenders.name: Tonia
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference for someone and hopefully impact their life for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel to trade shows for my client and purchase merchandise to be sold in their specialty store.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: there is so much need in the world and we can help through programs (like this one) where the money gets directly to a partner.
lenders.occupational_info: i'm a jazz pianist and composer who also teaches at a university.

lenders.name: Taryl
lenders.loan_because: The joy of giving.  Enpowering women.    All I can offer is an opportunity - like so many opportunities I have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: Managing a small business.   Must attend to income, payment of bills, employees, taxes, supplies, computers and basic office upkeep.

lenders.name: The Haskell Family
lenders.loan_because: This initial donation is a gift to our daughter Lily, for her first birthday.  I think this site is a wonderful idea and thought it would be a great thing to start for Lily.  We can do it each year and as she gets older, she can help pick who she would like to help.

lenders.name: Andrew & Vicky Crompton
lenders.loan_because: This is a small way to others a helping hand.

lenders.name: Neville
lenders.loan_because: because I see the need ,and it help people to be self reliance
lenders.occupational_info: I operate a small microfinance company in Kingston Jamaica, W.I.  and I know the impact of what a small amount of money can do for a family.

lenders.name: Rod & Joan
lenders.loan_because: We are entrepeneurs, and have found the energy and means to live as we choose for 27 years.  We enjoy what we do, and love our lives together.  We hope our support will encourage others to discover the same spirit in themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Our home is our santuary -- we enjoy the warmth of the interior and the continual surprise of the garden.  Rod helps others create interiors which inspire the same feeling of warmth.  Joan designs beaded jewelry based on vintage pieces she has discovered.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: It's a great feeling to be able to give something, however small it may seem!
lenders.occupational_info: I

lenders.name: dani martin
lenders.occupational_info: I study economy in Spain

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner, I know how important itnis to have capital to grow one's business, and I want to help those in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a stationery and shipping business.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.occupational_info: Software Developer

lenders.name: Carole and Len
lenders.occupation: Speech Pathologist and Retired HS Science Teacher
lenders.loan_because: Together with our family and friends, we have pooled our resources to make this loan in memory of Carole's dad, Vincent ,who recently passed away at age 89.  Vincent had an extraordinary work ethic and we feel this small contribution would  be a wonderful way to honor and remember him.

lenders.name: Jeroen
lenders.loan_because: it is the most personal way of helping people while they keep their independance

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.occupational_info: I ask many people questions, and they answer the questions on the internet or on paper.  I then I group the information into a report, and someone uses that information to make decisions.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.occupational_info: I help tell people's stories.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: self employed carpenter type

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is what life is all about!

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and the Internet, helping people connect online and learn more abou technology and business.

lenders.name: Cara
lenders.loan_because: Everyone has a dream and in this program and I can watch a dream come true.
lenders.occupational_info: In my current employment, I help passionate high school art students to pursue their dreams by helping them in applying to college.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I also need money from time to time and without people helping people our species will never get ahead. May all our generosity cross all borders and boundaries
lenders.occupational_info: small engine mechanic and shop owner helping others here and there

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: together, we can make the world a better place for all people

lenders.name: Antonio
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I perform IT audits which means that I am hired by several clients to assess their information systems controls and determine whether they are appropriate according to their policies and standards.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I support good hardworking people that have the initiative to succeed.

lenders.name: Caroline C
lenders.loan_because: I want to see small entrepreneurs succeed.

lenders.name: Darrel
lenders.loan_because: Poverty cannot be overcome until all people can live productive lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help ensure medicines are safe before they are put onto the market.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I can and I care. I really want to give others the opportunity to be successful!
lenders.occupational_info: non-profit education.

lenders.name: Rebekah & Sophiana
lenders.loan_because: It was a gift to us for Christmas from our Aunt Juliana
lenders.occupational_info: Elementary School Students

lenders.name: Jen Clessas
lenders.loan_because: I value small businesses and believe that economic growth of developing nations can occur through small, community involved entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an English language school answering phones and helping students with all their needs.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: God has given me so much, I want to give back.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I used to live in a developing country and I've seen what a difference an opportunity such as this can make in someone's life.

lenders.name: Trinity Menlo Park CA
lenders.loan_because: We care about others

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Giving in this way is an extension of a Christmas gift in memory of my father. My family has a traveling gift called the Kindness Cart. The recipient has the cart for one year to continue random acts of kindness in memory of my father. At the end of the year a report is given to the family and passed on to another. Loans made here work on a similar principle; kindness is paid forward to help others.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are in a less fortunate position not by choice.

lenders.name: Sasa Family
lenders.loan_because: We are very grateful and blessed in our lives and fortunate to have such a wonderful family. We want to help enrich the lives of other people, to help give them a chance for a better life. We want our children to know that there are other people around the world that work hard for their families and that we can offer them a helping hand so that they can live a better life too.
lenders.occupational_info: We work hard every day to keep up with every day demands, but it is worth every bit of sweat. My husband came to this country 30 years ago with no money and could not speak a word of English. Today he is a successful business man and as you can see we have a beautiful family.

lenders.name: Tecknomage
lenders.loan_because: I want to participate, in a small way, in making a better world for people.

lenders.name: Yasmine
lenders.loan_because: Empowering someone to help themsleves is the best gift you can give
lenders.occupational_info: Help corporations solve their financial and operational problems

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful for the opportunities I am given as a young female in the United States and this is my way of giving back to the international community :)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at New York University studying Economics, History, and Pre-business.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: I got a gift certificate for Christmas.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school for most of the day and then do homework when I get home. I also watch TV and I love to shop at the mall.

lenders.name: Ciaran/Cecelia
lenders.loan_because: we can and we want to help others.  We know that when we give, our help will help other kids through assisting their parents in their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a brother and sister wanting to find a way to start making a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Jack & Mary
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college level economics, and how that subject applies to U.S. and global economies.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I am a woman in a man's field and understand how difficult it can be to establish your career choice. God  blessed me with a heart to help and give to others, even when I needed help myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and coordinate the building of specality and handicap homes.
